comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: across the Hudson river from Palisades Amusement Park

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This is part of the assembly of ships that gathered in the Hudson River between May 8th and May 18th, 1915 for review by President Wilson. An article describing the Atlantic Fleet's arrival noted that the submarines were at 186th street. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10F12FC345A1273... However, another site describes this scene as at the 135th St. piers, which is more in line with the old Palisades Amusement Park. www.pigboats.com/subs/d-boats.html

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for your research in pinning down the location of the Presidential review.  We'll fill in some of the information along with the date the next time we update the record.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: More photos of the events in the Presidential Review of the Atlantic Fleet www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/tags/presidenti...
